comments.content: I'm sure you think this is romantic, but as a young woman who's been leered at way too often, I think it's creepy. All you know is what she looks like, and she's the girl of your dreams? Yikes. There's a reason women freak when approached by strangers on the subway ...

Is that the creepy guy from the Apple ads?

Cheers, Si

Good News :^)

[Hopeless Romantic Found His Mystery Girl Online](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106084817/http:/abcnews.go.com/Technology/story?id=3828525&page=1)
